blog_post.content:
### How to Turn Customer Photos into Powerful Shopify Marketing

#### TL;DR (Summary)
Encouraging customers to share photos with your products builds trust and inspires new buyers on Shopify.

---

#### Quick Tips for User-Generated Content
- Run photo contests with prizes
- Feature customer images on product pages
- Create a branded hashtag
- Always ask permission before sharing

---

#### Why Use Customer Photos?
They provide social proof, boost engagement, and create authentic marketing.

---

#### Internal Linking Example
Want more ways to build trust?  
[Read our guide to customer reviews for Shopify](#).

---

#### Call to Action
Ready to inspire your audience?  
**Start featuring customer photos and grow your Shopify sales!**  
[Contact us for UGC campaign ideas](#)

---

#### Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

**Q: How do I get customers to share photos?**
A: Offer incentives, run contests, and make it easy with clear instructions.

**Q: Can I use customer photos in ads?**
A: Yes, but always get written permission first.

**Q: What if I don’t have many customer photos?**
A: Start small—feature the best ones and encourage more over time.
